name: RECURVE
description:
RECURVE is takes influence from classic arcade and bullet hell but strives to be something more. Each level was designed with the hopes of shaping a unique experience when compared to other space shooters.

So far this is the game I am most proud to have designed and created primarily on my own. My good friend helped me compose some fantastic music for the game, an act which I have been greatly humbled by.

I hope you play and enjoy  RECURVE!

My apologies but the flash version of RECURVE will be coming out a little later due to some exporting issues.

Feel free to follow me on social media to stay up to date with my future work:
